publication.title: Wavelet-based preconditioners for boundary integral equations
Two-Level Additive Schwarz Preconditioners for the hp Version of the Galerkin Boundary Element Method for 2-d Problems
Multilevel additive Schwarz method for the hp version of the Galerkin boundary element method
publication.keyword: Additive Schwarz Method;Blow Up;Boundary Element Method;Boundary Integral Equation Method;Condition Number;Multilevel Method;Preconditioned Conjugate Gradient;Singular Integral Equation;
publication.abstract: We study a multilevel additive Schwarz method for the h-p version of the Galerkin boundary element method with geometrically graded meshes. Both hypersingular and weakly singular integral equations of the rst kind are considered. As it is well known the h-p version with geometric meshes con- verges exponentially fast in the energy norm. However, the condition number of the Galerkin
